name: Eternal Autumn
description:
You're an android, and you need help. Luckily, Yuna and her girlfriend Shiori agree to lend a hand. Yuna is special and together you unlock her power. What will happen?

A short visual novel with two endings.

Suitable for all ages (some suggestive language, violence)

Sprites by Muggu: https://twitter.com/MUG_kaburi
